text: Shahriar Nafees Ahmed () (born 25 January 1986) is a Bangladeshi cricketer. He is a left-handed opening batsman. He made his One Day International (ODI) debut for Bangladesh in 2005. The opposition team was England. In 2005 he played his first Test. Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi Muslims Category:Cricketers from Dhaka
title: Shahriar Nafees
